author: SeverinDiederichs
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a new experimental PhysicsList `FTFP_BERT_EMA`, which uses the `AdePTTrackingManager` similarly to how the `FTFP_BERT_EMH` uses the `G4HepEmTrackingManager`. This is the basic integration of AdePT.
Note that further changes are needed in CMSSW to handle the parallel tracking on the GPU, so this PR alone is not functional. As discussed with @civanch

#### PR validation:

Tested locally that AdePT works and runs, however, as multiple other things are needed, no automated test can be added for this initial PR.
